column2: "Afei Filistiafo nye Israel koe: na Israel mbarimba no fii Filistiafo no enyim guanee
column3: na wɔtotɔree wɔ bepɔw Gilboa do."

column2: "Na Filistiafo no tsiiw Saul na ne mba dzendzenndzen; na Filistiafo no kum Jonatan

column3: na egyentofo no too no; na no ho hiahiaa no wɔ egyentofo no ntsi."

column4: na fa wɔ me; amma monomonomfo yi aammba na woeemmbogu m'enyim ase. Na n'akodzesoafo no annyɛ; osiandɛ osuroo dodoodow. Dɛm ntsi Saul faa n'afona

column2: "Na n'akodzesoafo no hun dɛ Saul ewu no
column3: ɔno so otwae hwee n'afona do dɛmara

column4: na ne fi nyinara wɔbɔɔ mu wui."

column2: "Na aber a Israel mbarimba a wɔwɔ bɔnsa no mu no hun dɛ woegu no
column3: na Saul na ne mbabanyin ewuwu no
column5: na woguanguanee; na Filistiafo no bae bɛtsenatsenaa mu."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ adze kyee enyim no
column3: Filistiafo a wɔbaa dɛ woribeyiyi atɔfo no ho ndzɛmba no hun Saul na ne mbabanyin no dɛ wɔatotɔ wɔ bepɔw Gilboa do."

column5: na wɔsomae ma wɔdze kekyimaa Filistiafo asaase do hyiae

column2: "Na wɔdze n'akodze no koguu hɔn abosondan mu
column3: na wɔdze ne tsir no kɛfaam Dagon dan mu."

column2: "Na aber a Jabes-gilead nyinara tsee dza Filistiafo dze ayɛ Saul no nyinara no
column4: "nna mbarimba a wɔyɛ ndam no nyinara soɛree
column6: na ne mba hɔn efun no
column8: na wobesiee hɔn mbiew no wɔ esudur no ase wɔ Jabes

column2: "Nna Saul wui wɔ no bɔn a ɔyɛe tsiaa EWURADZE
column3: osian EWURADZE n'asɛm a oenndzi do no ntsi; na eso dɛ okebisaa ɔsamamfrɛnyi hɔ adze hwehwɛɛ n'ekyir kwan

column2: "na ɔannhwehwɛ EWURADZE ekyir kwan: dɛm ntsi na okum no
column3: na ɔdaan ahendzi no maa Jesse ne ba David."
